title: The Kingdom of God is within you
creator: Leo Tolstoy
description: LibriVox recording of The Kingdom of God is within you, by Leo Tolstoy. The title of the book comes from Luke 17:21. It is a non-fiction work of the famous Russian author Leo Tolstoy. He wrote it after many years of reflexion on Christianity and Jesus. Many subjects are present such as wars, non-violence, misunderstanding by believers of the faith, etc. (Summary by Enko) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audiobooks, or to find out how you can volunteer, please visit librivox.org. Download M4B 00-08 (200MB) Download M4B 09-12 (163MB)
subject: librivox;  audiobook;  literature; philosophy; religion; christianity
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
